properties.name: Special
properties.description:
A crank gun must be cylinder-action.

For each attack made with a crank gun, the gun fires 6 times. Attack rolls are made for each shot.Furthermore, while a crank gun is mounted to a crank gun stand, for the purposes of circumventing the gun's heavy property and weight, the wielder is not considered to be carrying the crank gun, so long as the crank gun remains attached to its stand and the wielder is not carrying the stand.
